name: Advanced Calculator
description: Performs basic arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
formula: Add: A + B, Subtract: A – B, Multiply: A × B, Divide: A ÷ B (A and B are real numbers).

name: Square-Root Calculator
description: Finds the principal (positive) square root of any non-negative number.
formula: √A = the number that, when multiplied by itself, equals A.
steps: Find a number that squared equals 49.

name: Percentage Calculator
description: Calculates what percent one number is of another.
formula: Percentage = (Part ÷ Whole) × 100, where Part = A and Whole = B.

name: Simple-Interest Calculator
description: Computes simple interest on a principal over time at a fixed annual rate.
formula: SI = (P × R × T) ÷ 100, where P = principal, R = annual interest rate (%), T = time in years.

name: Circle-Area Calculator
description: Finds the area of a circle from its radius.
formula: Area = π r², where r = radius (same units).

name: BMI Calculator
description: Evaluates Body-Mass Index from weight and height.
formula: BMI = Weight (kg) ÷ Height² (m²).

name: Temperature Converter
description: Converts Celsius to Fahrenheit (or vice-versa).

name: Speed / Distance / Time Calculator
description: Finds any one of speed, distance or time when two are known.
formula: Speed = Distance ÷ Time, Distance = Speed × Time, Time = Distance ÷ Speed.

name: Compound-Interest Calculator
description: Computes future value with interest compounded at regular intervals.
formula: A = P (1 + r/n)^(n t), where P = principal, r = annual rate (decimal), n = compounds/year, t = years.

name: Loan EMI Calculator
description: Finds fixed Equated Monthly Installment for a loan.
formula: EMI = [P r (1+r)^N] ÷ [(1+r)^N − 1], P = principal, r = monthly rate, N = number of months.

name: CAGR Calculator
description: Computes compound annual growth rate between two values.
formula: CAGR = [(FV / PV)^(1/t) − 1] × 100 %, PV = initial value, FV = final value, t = years.

name: Body-Fat % Calculator (US Navy)
description: Estimates body-fat percentage using circumference method.
example: Waist 85 cm, Neck 40 cm, Height 180 cm

name: BMR Calculator (Mifflin-St Jeor)
description: Calculates Basal Metabolic Rate (daily calories at rest).
formula: Men: BMR = 10 W + 6.25 H − 5 A + 5; Women: −161 instead of +5. W = weight kg, H = height cm, A = age yr.

name: Daily Calorie Needs (TDEE)
description: Finds Total Daily Energy Expenditure using BMR × activity factor.
formula: TDEE = BMR × Activity Factor (1.2 sedentary … 1.9 very active).

name: Rectangle-Area Calculator
description: Computes area and perimeter of a rectangle.
formula: Area = L × W, Perimeter = 2 (L + W).

name: Circle Circumference Calculator
description: Finds the circumference of a circle.
formula: C = 2 π r, where r is radius.

name: Triangle-Area (Heron) Calculator
description: Uses Heron’s formula to find area from three sides.
formula: Area = √[s(s−a)(s−b)(s−c)], where s = (a+b+c)/2.

name: Sphere Volume Calculator
description: Finds volume and surface area of a sphere.
formula: Volume = 4/3 π r³, Surface = 4 π r².

name: Cylinder Calculator
description: Computes volume and surface area of a right circular cylinder.
formula: Volume = π r² h, Surface = 2πr(r + h).

name: Quadratic-Equation Solver
description: Finds roots of ax²+bx+c=0 using quadratic formula.

name: LCM Calculator
description: Finds least common multiple of two integers.
formula: LCM(a,b) = |a × b| ÷ GCD(a,b).

name: GCD (HCF) Calculator
description: Finds greatest common divisor of two integers via Euclidean algorithm.
formula: GCD(a,b): repeatedly replace larger by remainder until remainder 0.

name: Single-Event Probability
description: Computes probability of a favourable outcome.
formula: P = Favourable Outcomes ÷ Total Outcomes.

name: Permutation Calculator (nPr)
description: Counts ordered arrangements of r objects from n.
formula: nPr = n! ÷ (n − r)!

name: Combination Calculator (nCr)
description: Counts unordered selections of r objects from n.
formula: nCr = n! ÷ [r!(n − r)!]

name: Mean (Average) Calculator
description: Finds arithmetic mean of a data set.
formula: Mean = Σx ÷ n, where Σx = sum of values, n = count.

name: Standard-Deviation Calculator
description: Computes population standard deviation of data.
formula: σ = √[Σ(x − μ)² ÷ n], μ = mean.

name: Ohm’s-Law Calculator
description: Relates voltage, current and resistance.
formula: V = I × R, I = V ÷ R, R = V ÷ I.

name: Electrical-Power Calculator
description: Computes power from voltage and current.
formula: P = V × I, where V in volts, I in amperes, P in watts.

name: Molarity Calculator
description: Finds solution molarity (mol/L).
formula: M = moles solute ÷ liters solution.

name: Solution Dilution Calculator
description: Uses C₁V₁ = C₂V₂ to find final concentration or volume.
formula: C₁ V₁ = C₂ V₂, C = concentration, V = volume.
example: Stock 1 M, need 0.1 M, final volume 100 mL
steps: V₁ = C₂ V₂ ÷ C₁ = 0.1×100 ÷ 1 = 10 mL stock.

name: Ideal Gas Law Calculator
description: Relates pressure, volume, moles, and temperature.
formula: PV = nRT, P in atm, V in L, n moles, R = 0.0821, T in Kelvin.
example: n = 1 mol, T = 300 K, P = 2 atm → V = ?

name: Return-on-Investment Calculator
description: Measures profitability as percent gain.
formula: ROI = (Gain − Cost) ÷ Cost × 100 %.
